page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: {CREICH CHURCH }IS NOW PART OF A BIGGER CHURCH AREA,{CREICH,FLISK AND {KILMANY}.THE MINISTER GOES TO{CREICH {CHURCH}EVERY OTHER WEEK.THE TOTAL CONGREGATION IS ABOUT{250}PEOPLE.THERE USED TO BE A{BIBLE CLASS}AND A{SUNDAY {SCHOOL}.THE{BIBLE CLASS}HAS STOPPED BUT THE{SUNDAY SCHOOL}STILL CARRIES ON EACH WEEK.EACH YEAR AT{CHRISTMAS}THE {SUNDAY SCHOOL}HOLDS A PLAY IN THE CHURCH ON THE{SUNDAY}NEAREST{ {CHRISTMAS.}MOST PEOPLE AT THE{SUNDAY {SCHOOL}TAKE PART IN IT.{CREICH CHURCH} WAS BUILT IN 1832 AND HAS ONLY HAD MINOR REPAIRS TO THE INSIDE eg. LIGHTING OR ELECTRICITY. {MOONZIE CHURCH}HAS BEEN CLOSED DOWN SINCE 1971.IT WAS MENTIONED AS FAR BACK AS 1202 AND WE NOW IT WAS RE DEDICATED IN 1245 BY {DAVID DE {BERNHAM.}IT IS SO HIGH THAT IT WAS USED AS A NAVIGATION AID.
